body:
Comment 8: 
I've resolved my local build environment issues, and can now build the installers.
(something not mentioned in any docs I found was that I needed mingw-w64 instead of the
default mingw32)


I've also found and fixed what I think are some of the issues with the installer,
causing the upgrade to fail.  However I haven't been able to test my theoretical fixes.

The problem is that it appears the build process updates the working copy to the
release-branch.go1.2 branch right before the installer build process starts, which means
it's not using the fixed installer.wxs version on the release-branch.go1.3 branch.

I'm still investigating why this is happening, but if I'm missing something obvious
please let me know.
